mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM goods_sku_specs_value AS goods_sku_specs_value LEFT JOIN goods_specs_value AS goods_specs_value ON goods_sku_specs_value.`specs_value_id` = goods_specs_value.`id` where goods_sku_specs_value.`sku_id` =#{skuId} AND goods_sku_specs_value.`del_flag` = '0' AND goods_specs_value.`del_flag` = '0'

SELECT ANY_VALUE(goods_specs_value.`name`) AS specsValueName, goods_specs_value.`id`, ANY_VALUE(goods_sku_specs_value.`pic_url`) AS picUrl, ANY_VALUE(goods_sku_specs_value.`specs_value_id`) AS specsValueId FROM goods_sku_specs_value AS goods_sku_specs_value LEFT JOIN goods_specs_value AS goods_specs_value ON goods_specs_value.`id` = goods_sku_specs_value.`specs_value_id` WHERE goods_sku_specs_value.`spu_id` = #{spuId} AND goods_specs_value.`specs_id` = #{specsId} AND goods_sku_specs_value.`del_flag` = '0' AND goods_specs_value.`del_flag` = '0' GROUP BY goods_specs_value.`id`
